casebody.data:
Fant, Appellant, v. Board of Trustees, Regional Transit Authority, Appellee.

[Cite as Fant v. Bd. of Trustees, Regional Transit Auth. (1990), 50 Ohio St. 3d 72.]

(No. 89-1755 Submitted February 13, 1990 Decided April 4, 1990.) Henry J. Fant, pro se.

The judgment of the court of appeals is affirmed for the reason stated by that court in its journal entry: “R.C. 149.43(C) authorizes only ‘attorney fees,’ not compensation to pro se litigants.”

Sweeney, Holmes, Douglas, Wright, H. Brown and Re snick, JJ., concur. Moyer, C.J., not participating.
